column2: Music, to-day, is only the art of executing difficult things, and that which is only difficult cannot please long.
column3: Music, to day, is only the art of executing difficult things, and that which is only difficult cannot please long.

column2: They sat down to table, and after an excellent dinner they went into the library.
column3: They sat down to table, and after an excellent dinner they went into the library.

column2: For the matter of that I say what I think, and I care very little whether others think as I do."
column3: For the matter of that I say what I think, and I care very little whether others think as I do."

column2: There would not be much harm in that, said Martin.
column3: There would not be much harm in that, said Martin.
